channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6765, MT6768, MT6779, MT6785, MT8385, MT8666, MT8667, MT8766, MT8768, MT8781, MT8788, MT8789

item.title: CVE-2024-20087|2024-09-03T14:18:57.075Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6765%2C%20mt6768%2C%20mt6779%2C%20mt6785%2C%20mt8385%2C%20mt8666%2C%20mt8667%2C%20mt8766%2C%20mt8768%2C%20mt8781%2C%20mt8788%2C%20mt8789
item.description: In vdec, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS08932916; Issue ID: MSV-1550.
